description:
A stable, comfortable tandem kayak for exploring lakes or lazy rivers. The front seat slides back to create a solo cruiser with a deluxe amount of space for fishing tackle or a furry friend. A long waterline lets you cover distances efficiently and the open cockpits accommodates paddlers of different sizes.

  • Rotomoulded polyethylene for increased stiffness and durability
  • Revolution Seating System is adjustable to a wide range of body sizes and shapes
  • Shallow v shape improves tracking and stability
  • Soft chines give smooth edging at unlimited angles
  • Secure flip lock hatch covers
  • Deck rigging holds spare paddles and safety gear
  • Front and rear grab handles aids carrying
name: Current Designs Solara 145T Tandem Kayak
